title: Eton Mess
description: --- Eton Mess - strawberry colored welts and deliciously creamy buttocks. ---Ira is in James’ office, ready to play the role of a school teacher and deliver the spanking of a lifetime. But to immerse himself in the fantasy, James must let go of all inhibitions and embrace the cricket paddle.*“Scavengers: Eton Mess” is a special erotic short story taking place after the last book in the “Scavengers” series, “Scavengers:September”.
